1.7 Warning and error conditions

row-number

Function

Summary

Returns the row number at which the diagnostic occurred.

Signature

row-number diagnostic => row-number

Arguments

diagnostic
An instance of <odbc-diagnostic>.

row-number
An instance of <integer>.

Library

SQL-ODBC

Module

SQL-ODBC

Description

Returns the row number at which diagnostic occurred.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
